scripts.dev:full: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const isWin = process.platform === 'win32'; const spawnNpm = (cwd, script) => isWin ? spawn('cmd.exe', ['/d','/s','/c','npm','run',script], { cwd, stdio: 'inherit' }) : spawn('npm', ['run', script], { cwd, stdio: 'inherit' }); const ping = async (url, ms) => { const c = new AbortController(); const t = setTimeout(() => c.abort(), ms); try { const r = await fetch(url, { signal: c.signal }); return r.ok; } catch { return false; } finally { clearTimeout(t); } }; (async () => { const backendUp = await ping('http://localhost:4000/api/health', 400); if (!backendUp) spawnNpm('backend', 'dev'); spawnNpm(process.cwd(), 'dev'); })();"
